QuestData.Title: No Crate Unturned
QuestData.Description:
That explosion will likely bring onlookers from the House of Rituals. We must act quickly.
Search through the debris for anything that looks out of the ordinary. It is likely that Kel'Thuzad's mystery reagent won't be hard to spot.
QuestData.LogDescription: Search the Broker's Crates for Kel'Thuzad's special reagent.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Balmedar in the House of Rituals.
QuestData.RewardText:
The runes on this blade... they are a hallmark of domination magic!
This is not good, $c.
